data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Thanjavur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu, India

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 2,379,436 people in Thanjavur who are far from you. Please add 481 new house churches this year.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Thanjavur.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Thanjavur to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Panikkan people.
Lord, the believers in the county of Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 26,465 believers in the county of Thanjavur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

location.name: Thanjavur
location.people_groups_list: Mala Pulayan, Vellalan Nanchilnattu, Agamudaiyan Udayar, Bania Chetti, Agamudaiyan Nattaman
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mala Pulayan (71,000), Vellalan Nanchilnattu (196,000), Agamudaiyan Udayar (8,600), Bania Chetti (728,000), Agamudaiyan Nattaman (659,000)
